text: geudeul-eun seoseodo, anj-aseodo, nuwoseodo hananim-eul gieoghago haneulgwa daejiui changjo-e gwanhayeo suggohaneun jadeul-ila. “jeohuiui junim-isiyeo! dangsinkkeseoneun amu mogjeog eobs-i igeos-eul changjohasin geos-i anibnida. wanbyeoghasin dangsin-isibnida! geuleoni buljiog-ui beol-eulobuteo jeohuileul guhae jusibsio.”
